translations: v.激励（energize 的现在分词）；通电

phrs.translation: 电磁铁释放二, 电磁石开释, 介质类
劲香氛, 资生堂红色活力来源, 红色活力
焕采日霜, 焕彩日霜, 日霜

sentences.sentence: Acupuncture has a harmonizing and energizing effect on mind and body.
sentences.translation: 针灸疗法有协调和激活身心的功效。

sentences.sentence: "It's draining and de-energizing when people are in an environment and they just have to salute and not be themselves," he says.
sentences.translation: 他说：“当人们处在一个只需要敬礼而不需要做自己的环境中时，会让人精疲力竭、失去活力。”

sentences.sentence: Shades of red are energizing and intimate.
sentences.translation: 红色可让人觉得有活力和亲切感。
